description_html: A fresh design for HOLLY HUNT Beyond Borders, Orion evokes patterns within nature in its network of connections. This organic design has a geometric structure and symmetry that is softened by the elliptical lines. Colored in either contrasting or tonal options, this rug showcases both 100% silk and a luxurious blend of wool and silk. Perfect for use in a variety of settings, Orion can function as a focal point or a backdrop to a wide range of vignettes.
